name: Vegan Lemon Asparagus Pasta
description: Vegan Lemon Asparagus Pasta - 30 mins! Creamy Lemon Alfredo style sauce with tofu with fettuccine and pan roasted garlic asparagus and more lemon. Vegan Nutfree Recipe. Can be Glutenfree. 17 gm of protein
recipeIngredient: 8 oz fettuccine or other pasta (, glutenfree pasta if needed)
1 lb asparagus (, chopped into 2 inch pieces, remove tough bottom stem)
dash of salt and black pepper
7 oz firm tofu ( or silken tofu)
1 cup non dairy milk ( such as almond or soy)
1 tsp flour (, use starch or rice flour to make glutenfree)
2 tsp italian seasoning ((I like 1 tsp basil, 1/2 tsp parsley, 1/3 tsp rosemary))
zest of the other half of the lemon
pepper flakes (,black pepper, vegan parm for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the fettuccine according to instructions on the package, rinse in cold water and set aside. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the fettuccine according to instructions on the package, rinse in cold water and set aside. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add asparagus, pinch of salt and black pepper and mix. Cover to cook/steam for 3 mins or until bright green. Transfer to a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Add asparagus, pinch of salt and black pepper and mix. Cover to cook/steam for 3 mins or until bright green. Transfer to a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to the same skillet over medium heat, add garlic and cook for a few seconds. Add onion and mushrooms and cook for 2 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil to the same skillet over medium heat, add garlic and cook for a few seconds. Add onion and mushrooms and cook for 2 mins

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend ingredients from tofu to flour until smooth. Add the blended sauce to the skillet, add herbs, and mix in. Bring to a simmer. Fold in the rest of the lemon zest, lemon slices. Taste and adjust salt and flavor with additional salt , garlic powder, herbs and some black pepper if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend ingredients from tofu to flour until smooth. Add the blended sauce to the skillet, add herbs, and mix in. Bring to a simmer. Fold in the rest of the lemon zest, lemon slices. Taste and adjust salt and flavor with additional salt , garlic powder, herbs and some black pepper if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the the cooked pasta and 2/3 of the asparagus and mix in. Cover and take off heat and let the flavors meld for 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the the cooked pasta and 2/3 of the asparagus and mix in. Cover and take off heat and let the flavors meld for 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with pepper flakes, black pepper and fresh basil and optional vegan parm and the cooked asparagus. and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with pepper flakes, black pepper and fresh basil and optional vegan parm and the cooked asparagus. and serve.

keywords: creamy lemon asparagus pasta, creamy lemon sauce for aspragus, lemon asparagus pasta
